article_title: UN warns of 'slaughter' if Israel launches Rafah assault
sentence: Rafah  has  come  under  heavy  Israeli  air  strikes  in  recent  days,  with  at  least  67  people  killed  there  on  Monday  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

sentence: At  least  1,200  people  were  killed  during  attacks  in  Israel  by  Hamas-led  gunmen  on  7  October  last  year.

article_title: UN warns of 'slaughter' if Israel launches Rafah assault
sentence: More  than  28,400  Palestinians,  mostly  women  and  children,  have  been  killed  and  more  than  68,000  wounded  since  the  war  began,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
